    Reference

    All functions

    create_pain_model()

    Create a new pain model

    create_strain_standard()

    Create new strain standards

    default_parameters()

    Default parameters for extracting paw features

    default_standards()

    Default strain-based standards for paw features

    extract_features()

    Extract features for paw time series

    h5_to_csv()

    Batch convert SLEAP H5 files into DeepLabCut-like CSVs

    jones2020.tracks

    Jones et al. (2020) paw trajectory data

    mini_paws()

    Run PAWS analysis for a single CSV (rather than in batch)

    pain_class()

    Identify pain class based on pain score

    pain_score()

    Scoring pain from paw features

    paws

    paws: Pain Assessment at Withdrawal Speeds

    paws_analysis()

    Run PAWS analysis on a full set of CSVs in batch

    paws_dashboard()

    Launch the PAWS Dashboard

    plot_filter_graphs()

    Plot a given trajectory under all available filters

    plot_pain_scores()

    Plot pain score distributions

    plot_paws_features()

    Plot PAWS features

    plot_univariate_projection()

    Plot a univariate projection under a given filter

    set_parameters()

    Convenience function for changing parameters
